rows.label: qst300401_msg001
rows.name: (仮)受注条件を満たしていないときのテキスト

rows.label: qst300401_msg002
rows.name: 受注テキスト

rows.label: qst300401_msg003
rows.name: 受注後テキスト

rows.label: qst300401_msg004
rows.name: タスク８クリア後テキスト

rows.label: qst300401_msg0001
rows.name:
The Hræsvelgr Mercenaries' reputation
is building up nicely!

rows.label: qst300401_msg0002
rows.name:
And thanks to that, we've bagged
ourselves a big job.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0003
rows.name:
If you want the details, you'd best
talk to the client directly.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm hoping you guys'll be able to
take care of this one. The client
requested you specifically.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0005
rows.name:
The client we're talking about is...
well, I shouldn't really talk about it
here, but let's say they're a big shot.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0006
rows.name:
If you do a good job with this one,
I think our little mercenary band will
have officially hit the big time.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0007
rows.name: So give it your best shot, yeah?

rows.label: qst300401_msg0008
rows.name:
The client's waiting for you in a place
called the Aquagardens, in the region
of Fons Maim Waters.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0009
rows.name:
But you'll need to go there
between midnight and 5 o'clock
in the morning. Got that?

rows.label: qst300401_msg0101
rows.name:
The client's waiting for you in
Fons Maim Waters, in a place
called the Aquagardens.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0102
rows.name:
You can only meet them between
midnight and 5 o'clock in the morning.
Is that OK?

rows.label: qst300401_msg0201
rows.name: Welcome back.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0202
rows.name:
Sorry I couldn't tell you anything
about the client in advance.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0203
rows.name:
While you were out looking for the
goods, we got a request here to
catch the thief responsible.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0204
rows.name:
I always thought queens didn't do
much but laze about on their thrones...

rows.label: qst300401_msg0205
rows.name:
Guess I was dead wrong.
That lady's a proper leader.

rows.label: qst300401_msg0206
rows.name:
Anyway, can you come with me
for a moment?

rows.label: qst300401_msg0207
rows.name:
I'll be waiting for you in front
of old Vandham's grave.
Can you bring Suzaku with you, too?
